member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY
member.summary: Description of a vertex element in a vertex buffer in an output slot.

member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.SemanticName
member.summary: Type of output element; possible values include: "POSITION", "NORMAL", or "TEXCOORD0". Note that if SemanticName is NULL thenComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.SemanticIndex
member.summary: Output element's zero-based index. Should be used if, for example, you have more than one texture coordinate stored in each vertex.

member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.StartComponent
member.summary: Which component of the entry to begin writing out to. Valid values are 0 to 3. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2.

member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.ComponentCount
member.summary: The number of components of the entry to write out to. Valid values are 1 to 4. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2. Note that if SemanticName is NULL thenComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

member.name: D3D11_SO_DECLARATION_ENTRY.OutputSlot
member.summary: The associated stream output buffer that is bound to the pipeline (see ). The valid range for OutputSlot is 0 to 3.
